Services.services_that_take_care: Services that take care of everything for you.

Banner.prevention: Prevent Expensive Repairs and Protect Your Home with Ease
Banner.simplify: Forget unexpected repairs. Take care of your home with Flix Home.

Home_to_work.title: How It Works
Home_to_work.description: Taking care of your home has never been easier. With Flix Home, prevent problems or solve them with quick services and tailored maintenance plans, all in one click.
Home_to_work.first_description: From urgent repairs to preventive plans, select what your home needs in just a few clicks.
Home_to_work.second_description: Click to schedule and speak with our assistant on WhatsApp – fast and hassle-free.
Home_to_work.three_description: Receive confirmation from our team, who finalize the scheduling and payment securely.
Home_to_work.four_description: Have the service completed by top professionals and save time and money in the future.

Services.title: Services That Solve Everything for You
Services.description: Keep your home flawless without effort. From cleaning to repairs, we are your trusted ally.
Services.button: Explore all services and solve it now!

Depoinments.title: What Our First Customers Say About Flix Home
Depoinments.first: Flix Home’s free diagnosis alerted me to a plumbing issue I wasn’t even aware of. I feel more secure now.
Depoinments.second: With preventive maintenance, I have already avoided a heater breakdown. Flix Home really makes life easier!
Depoinments.three: I love how easy it is to schedule everything via WhatsApp. The team is quick and gives me confidence in my home maintenance.
Depoinments.four: I started with the free plan and already see the value of keeping my assets up to date. I recommend it to anyone who wants to avoid surprises!
Depoinments.five: Flix Home fixed a kitchen leak in record time. Now I’m trying the plan to prevent more headaches.
Depoinments.button: Talk via WhatsApp and start today

Partners.title: Junta-te à Flix Home como parceiro
Partners.description: És um técnico qualificado ou tens uma pequena empresa de serviços? Trabalha connosco, ganha mais clientes e faz parte de uma plataforma que valoriza a tua experiência. Recebe pedidos diretamente no teu telemóvel e aumenta os teus ganhos sem complicações.

Initials.title: Proteja a sua casa hoje mesmo!
Initials.description: Esqueça imprevistos dispendiosos. Com a Flix Home, mantém os seus ativos em dia e vive com mais tranquilidade.

Faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faqs.first_description: Flix Home is your solution to keep your home in top shape without hassle. We offer preventive maintenance plans to protect your home assets, such as plumbing or electricity, and fast services for repairs or cleaning, all with trusted professionals.
Faqs.second_description: It’s simple: choose a service or plan on our website and click to schedule via WhatsApp. Our virtual assistant collects details in minutes, and our team confirms the time and payment. Need to adjust? Just contact us through the same channel.
Faqs.three: Does Flix Home offer service guarantees?
Faqs.three_description: Yes, all services performed by our partners come with a satisfaction guarantee. If something doesn’t go as expected, contact us via WhatsApp, and we’ll resolve it quickly.
Faqs.four_description: Our professionals are qualified technicians, from independent workers to small businesses, selected for their experience and reliability. They are part of our network to ensure your home is in good hands.
Faqs.five: What services are available with Flix Home?
Faqs.five_description: We offer preventive maintenance for assets like plumbing, electricity, and appliances, as well as on-demand services like urgent repairs and deep cleaning. Check all options on our website!
Faqs.six: How do the maintenance plans work?
Faqs.six_description: Our plans – Freemium, Essential, and Family – include regular diagnostics and maintenance for your assets. Start for free with Freemium and choose the one that best suits your home.
Faqs.seven: How much does it cost to join Flix Home?
Faqs.seven_description: The Freemium Plan is free to start, with initial diagnostics. Paid plans start at €15/month, with fixed prices and no surprises. See details on our website!
Faqs.height: Can I cancel or change my plan?
Faqs.height_description: Yes, you can adjust or cancel your plan at any time via WhatsApp. We want you to have total flexibility.

Plans.title: Want to prevent long-term issues? Choose the plan that keeps your home protected from unexpected events
Plans.first_description: Free diagnosis of your assets to get started.
Plans.second_description: Annual maintenance of an essential asset.
Plans.three_description: Complete protection for all your assets.
